recipe.title: Beef Stir Fry
recipe.description: Quick Asian-style stir fry with tender beef and crisp vegetables

steps.descr: Marinate beef in soy sauce and cornstarch for 10 minutes
steps.instructions: Marinate beef in soy sauce and cornstarch for 10 minutes

on_enter.say: Let's get started by marinating the beef in soy sauce and cornstarch. Give it a good mix and let it sit for ten minutes. This will make it lovely and tender.

steps.descr: Heat wok or large pan on high heat
steps.instructions: Heat wok or large pan on high heat

on_enter.say: Right, now let's heat up the wok or a large pan on high heat. We want it nice and hot to get that perfect sear on the beef.

steps.descr: Stir-fry beef in batches until browned, set aside
steps.instructions: Stir-fry beef in batches until browned, set aside

on_enter.say: Now, let's stir-fry the beef in batches. Listen for that sizzle and cook until it's beautifully browned. Then set it aside.

steps.descr: Add vegetables and garlic, stir-fry for 3 minutes
steps.instructions: Add vegetables and garlic, stir-fry for 3 minutes

on_enter.say: Now add those lovely vegetables and garlic to the wok. Stir-fry them for about three minutes until they're vibrant and just tender.
Let's bring that beef back into the wok. It's going to soak up all those wonderful flavors.

steps.descr: Add oyster sauce and a splash of water
steps.instructions: Add oyster sauce and a splash of water

on_enter.say: Now add the oyster sauce and just a splash of water. This will create a lovely sauce that coats everything beautifully.

steps.descr: Toss everything together and serve over rice
steps.instructions: Toss everything together and serve over rice

on_enter.say: Finally, let's toss everything together until it's all well combined. Serve it over some steaming rice and enjoy your delicious beef stir fry!

notes.text:
Slice beef against the grain for tenderness
Cook on very high heat for best results
Don't overcrowd the wok
